name: Pure Organic Rosehip Oil
description:
The most gentle and natural way to care for mature, dry or sensitive skin is with our 100% pure, Organic Rosehip Oil.
Rosehip oil is a deeply hydrating, gentle healing oil which, as a 'dry 'oil, is readily and quickly absorbed into the skin. Suitable for all skin types, but especially dry, mature or sensitive skin including eczema, this gentle oil replenishes dull or tired skin, helps repair damaged skin and can reduce the visible signs of ageing such as wrinkles and pigmentation.

Rich in Vitamin A, a natural antioxidant, and containing high quantities of omega 3 and omega 6 fatty acids, Rosehip oil is full of the essential nutrients needed to aid the repair of, and revitalise dull, tired, stressed or damaged skin and restore the skin's natural healthy glow.
Apply a few drops to the face, neck and d√©colletage at bed time, massaging well into the skin, for a deeply hydrating treatment. Use in the morning sparingly for healthy glow. Allow time to penetrate the skin before applying make-up.

Our Organic Rosehip Seed Oil is cold pressed and unrefined, and contains no chemicals or solvents. Please note that this is a natural product , and there may be variations in colour and scent from batch to batch.
Presented in a pretty blue glass dropper bottle. Vol - 30 ml

name: Organic Rose Water
description:
If like me, as a little girl, you collected rose petals to make 'perfume', the exquisite scent of this Organic rose water will remind you of those long, hot summer days.
Gently soothing and recommended for all skin types, our 100% Pure Rose Water contains no added ingredients.
Cleansing and toning, it has a calming effect on irritated skin. Balancing the skins natural PH, its natural qualities are especially beneficial for sensitive, dry and mature skin. 
Use as the purest of skin toners and to refresh and sooth the face after a shower or bath.

Size : 100ml

name: Hand Repair Balm
description:
For climbers and canoeists, students and scientists, journalists, accountants and rock gods! Whatever your pastime, our hand (elbow, feet and any other bits of dry skin) repair balm, is a skin loving all natural mix of of butters, oils and beeswax.
Just rub it on where ever it is needed and after a few moments it will be absorbed leaving your skin feeling relieved and soothed.
Neat, compact, pocket sized and long lasting. Never leave home without it.

Min weight:22g
Caution: contains hazelnut oil and should be avoided by those with nut allergy.


Ingredients: please see ingredients page.

name: Pure Handmade Soap
description:
2 petite bars of our natural handmade soap, made in North Yorkshire from creamy butters and rich oils. Soap as it should be - gentle, chemical free and good for your skin. Please choose your choice of soap from the drop down menu.

Min weight: each bar 45g


Ingredients: Please see our Ingredients page for full details.
